article_text:
We honor civic do-gooders who helped Charlotte region

Their dedication and care made this a better place to live

article_metadata.title: They made Charlotte better in 2015 | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: As each year draws to a close, the Observer’s editorial board looks back over the preceding 12 months and seeks out the heroes among us who have made this region a better place to live. They fed the hungry, helped the hurting and the broken, and protected our environment. For all you do, we say thank you!
og.title: They made Charlotte better in 2015
